releaseNotes:
Auto-generated from commit: feat: add sidebar to PausaPage and responsive mobile layout

- Replace custom navigation with Sidebar/StaffSidebar based on user role
- Create mobile-game.css with CSS variables for responsive card sizing
- Cards resize from 70x98px (desktop) to 50x70px (mobile <640px)
- Update Card component to use var(--card-width) and var(--card-height)
- Add game-card class for mobile optimizations
- Touch-friendly hit areas and visual feedback
